mapper.select: SELECT like_num FROM board_like_table WHERE like_user = #{writeId} ORDER BY like_num DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board_table SET like_cnt = like_cnt + 1 WHERE board_num = #{boardNum}
UPDATE board_table SET like_cnt = like_cnt - 1 WHERE board_num = #{boardNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE board_like_table WHERE like_num = #{boardNum} AND like_user = #{writeId}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD.board_num , BOARD.board_parent_num , BOARD.content , BOARD.write_id , TO_CHAR(BOARD.write_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS write_date , BOARD.reply_cnt , BOARD.like_cnt , USER_.user_name FROM board_table BOARD LEFT JOIN user_tb USER_ ON BOARD.write_id = USER_.user_id WHERE board_num = #{boardNum}
